snippet.title: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin - Official Orruk Kruleboyz Faction Trailer
snippet.description:
Learn more about Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin's Multiplayer and the Orruk Kruleboyz faction in this new trailer. 

The Orruk Kruleboyz are a brutal faction that specialise in trickery in the upcoming real-time strategy game. They are led by the devious Killaboss Dankfeer, whose goal is to bring destruction to the Stormcast Eternals’ fortress settlement of Harkanibus and establish himself as the dominant force of Ghur’s wildlands. The Kruleboyz will be playable as part of Realms of Ruin’s single-player campaign, as well as in multiplayer. Check out some new gameplay to see the scrappy squad in action alongside a look at the game's Competitive Multiplayer mode.

Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin is coming soon to PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

#IGN #Gaming #Warhammer
